text: La Shawn K. Ford (born 1971/1972) is an American politician and real-estate developer. He is a Democratic member of the Illinois House of Representatives, representing the 8th District since 2007."La Shawn K. Ford State Representative website". Retrieved 6/30/2016. He was born in Chicago. On November 29, 2012, Ford was indicted on charges of bank fraud. On August 4, 2014, all 17 felony counts of bank fraud and false information against Ford were dropped by federal prosecutors. In October 2018, Ford announced his candidacy for Mayor of Chicago for the election in 2019.La Shawn Ford Running for Chicago Mayor ==References== ==Other websites== *Representative LaShawn Ford (D) 8th District at the Illinois General Assembly **By session: 98th, 97th, 96th, 95th * *La Shawn Ford at Illinois House Democrats Category:1970s births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Real estate developers Category:Businesspeople from Chicago Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: La Shawn K. Ford
